title: Worth that watch
review:
This film is definitely worth a go. It's based on a true story and this film will keep you glued to your seat because of its awesome racing scenes.
I have given 7 because I am not that fond of or fascinated with cars or else the film definitely deserves more.

title: Quality Crime suspense
review: Here is another suspense film fun to watch and you'll stick on till the end of the film.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: The force maintained
review: I went to watch this one with low expectations after the disappointment of the previous Star Wars film - The latest film has made it up for that with a strong plot and fascinating scenes. This one is not to be missed if you have watched the previous Star Wars films.

title: Boredom at its best
review: Stay away - don't watch. I have never seen such a boring film in my life ðŸ˜©

title: A great story but definitely not Oscar winning
review: No doubt this was a great film with a strong plot but not that awesome to win an Oscar award - otherwise this film is definitely worth that watch showing some humor and suspense.

title: Waste Of Time
review: Useless 2 hours film that only focuses on an America- Japan war during WW2. You'll be yawning though out the film duration.
